title: 127: Plato X - "Er Goes to Hell"
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In book X of Plato's Republic, he rails on imitative poetry some more, argues for the immortality of the soul, and tells a creepy story about a guy named "Er."
itunes:author: The Three Fates
itunes:subtitle: 'Cause poetry sucks, or so says Plato
itunes:summary: In book X of Plato's Republic, he rails on imitative poetry some more, argues for the immortality of the soul, and tells a creepy story about a guy named "Er."
itunes:title: 127: Plato X - "Er Goes to Hell"
